website_summaries.verdict: If you want a whimsical holiday nutcracker, this festive one from Kurt Adler is a wonderful choice.
pros: 15" tall figurine is a decorative nutcracker rather than a functional one
It comes nicely packaged and makes a nice addition to the collector's array
cons: Some reports of flimsy packaging and crooked details

customer_reviews.title: I love him!
customer_reviews.text: I love nutcrackers, but I am very picky about the ones I have. I only have a few because I don't just buy any. They have to speak to me. This guy did. I have added him to my gingerbread kitchen. He stands on my island and he is beautiful!! Very high quality!! I plan on buying another one from this company for myself next Christmas. Hopefully one will speak to me like this guy did. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: craig g matz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Christmas Decoration
customer_reviews.text: Great detail. Very cute. Great value - saw it in gift shop for much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soldier. Beautifully made and a welcome addition to my Christmas kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Aleta Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Gingerbread man
customer_reviews.text: He arrived in perfect condition. I was extremely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Diana Graham

customer_reviews.title: They will Not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Kurt Adler nutcrackers! The only ones that I buy. Have several. So colorful, shiny and makes me happy to look at.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: King of the Nutcrackers
customer_reviews.text: Love this nutcracker! In an army of 200 he stands out like a glorious king!❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Height and colors are so unbelievable. Great job
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the exceptional work done on these nutcrackers.
customer_reviews.author: Betty McLimore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It came well packed and in its original box. No damage. Vivid red color. Met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s very detailed and sparkly and will look great in the kitchen over the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Love Kurt Adler
customer_reviews.text: Kurt Adler has the best nutcrackers- they are well packaged, and each one has its own bit of character. We have several that we purchased over the years at the Dallas Ballet Nutcracker performances at Bass Hall in Ft Worth.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute, it will brighten up my kitchen next Christmas. Can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Seaside girl

product_meta.title: Kurt S. Adler Kurt Adler 15-Inch Gingerbread Chef Nutcracker
product_meta.description: Hollywood nutcrackers is a whimsical collection of nutcrackers created exclusively for Kurt s. Adler, Inc. And features an assortment of designs that put a unique, vibrant, memorable twist on traditional nutcrackers. This 15-inch gingerbread chef nutcracker from Kurt Adler is a fun and festive addition to any holiday decor or nutcracker collection. Its red and white design is embellished with gingerbread-inspired detailing for an extra festive touch
feature_bullets: Part of Kurt Adler Hollywood Nutcrackers collection
If this product does not come in Branded Kurt s. Adler, Inc. Packaging, please Contact Amazon
